alert.note: Alert for Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Sauk County through 915 AM CDT... At 829 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Richland Center, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baraboo, Reedsburg, Prairie Du Sac, Wisconsin Dells, Lake Wisconsin, Lake Delton, West Baraboo, Plain, Bluffview, North Freedom, Merrimac, Rock Springs, Loganville, Lime Ridge, Devils Lake St Park, and Hill Point. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 88 and 101. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 213 and 223. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
